meanings.definition: A small, round shield or buckler.
meanings.sent1: The knight carried a custrel to protect himself in battle.
meanings.sent2: The custrel was made of sturdy metal and adorned with intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: The custrel shield gleamed in the sunlight, catching the eye of all who passed by.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a custrel, shielding her true emotions from the world.
meanings.sent5: The custrel shielded the warrior from harm, a faithful companion in the heat of battle.
